verses.verse: וֶאֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> ve-'e-li-Sha' And Elisha הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet קָרָ֕א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra called לְאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> le-'a-Chad one מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the children הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im; of the prophets וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֜וֹ lo חֲגֹ֣ר <S%H2296><s%> cha-Gor unto him Gird up מָתְנֶ֗יךָ <S%H4975><s%> ma-te-Nei-cha, thy loins וְ֠קַח <S%H3947><s%> Ve-kach and take פַּ֣ךְ <S%H6378><s%> pach this box הַשֶּׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men of oil הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha, in thine hand וְלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ve-Lech and go רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> ra-Mot to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. Gilead

וּבָ֖אתָ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta And when thou comest שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah; there וּרְאֵֽה־ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'e-ho-Sha- thither look out שָׁ֠ם <S%H8033><s%> m there יֵה֨וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu there Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נִמְשִׁ֗י <S%H5250><s%> nim-Shi, of Nimshi וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta and go in וַהֲקֵֽמֹתוֹ֙ <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ke-mo-To and make him arise up מִתּ֣וֹך <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch from among אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, his brethren וְהֵבֵיאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> ve-he-vei-Ta and carry אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To חֶ֥דֶר <S%H2315><s%> Che-der him to an inner בְּחָֽדֶר׃ <S%H2315><s%> be-Cha-der. chamber

וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta Then take פַךְ־ <S%H6378><s%> fach- the box הַשֶּׁ֙מֶן֙ <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men of oil וְיָצַקְתָּ֣ <S%H3332><s%> ve-ya-tzak-Ta and pour עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho, [it] on his head וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> me-shach-Ti-cha I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel וּפָתַחְתָּ֥ <S%H6605><s%> u-fa-tach-Ta Then open הַדֶּ֛לֶת <S%H1817><s%> had-De-let the door וְנַ֖סְתָּה <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas-tah and flee וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not תְחַכֶּֽה׃ <S%H2442><s%> te-chak-Keh. and tarry

וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar So the young man הַנַּ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar [even] the young man הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet רָמֹ֥ת <S%H7433><s%> ra-Mot to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. Gilead

וַיָּבֹ֗א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo, And when he came וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei behold the captains הַחַ֙יִל֙ <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil of the host יֹֽשְׁבִ֔ים <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim, [were] sitting וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said דָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var I have an errand לִ֛י li אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha for הַשָּׂ֑ר <S%H8269><s%> has-Sar; to thee O captain וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu And Jehu אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- for מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi which מִכֻּלָּ֔נוּ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kul-La-nu, and he וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Unto which of all us;And he said אֵלֶ֥יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha for הַשָּֽׂר׃ <S%H8269><s%> has-Sar. To thee O captain

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom And he arose וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and went הַבַּ֔יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> hab-Bay-tah, into the house וַיִּצֹ֥ק <S%H3332><s%> vai-yi-Tzok and he poured הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> hash-She-men the oil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho; on his head וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said ל֗וֹ lo, כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מְשַׁחְתִּ֧יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> me-shach-Ti-cha I have anointed לְמֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am over the people יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. [even] over Israel

וְהִ֨כִּיתָ֔ה <S%H5221><s%> ve-Hik-ki-Tah, And thou shalt smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house אַחְאָ֖ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av of Ahab אֲדֹנֶ֑יךָ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-cha; thy master וְנִקַּמְתִּ֞י <S%H5358><s%> ve-nik-kam-Ti that I may avenge דְּמֵ֣י׀ <S%H1818><s%> de-Mei the blood עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dai of my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im, the prophets וּדְמֵ֛י <S%H1818><s%> u-de-Mei and the blood כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all עַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei of all the servants יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad at the hand אִיזָֽבֶל׃ <S%H348><s%> 'i-Za-vel. of Jezebel

וְאָבַ֖ד <S%H6><s%> ve-'a-Vad shall perish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit For the whole house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av; of Ahab וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and I will cut off לְאַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> le-'ach-'Av from Ahab מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <S%H8366><s%> mash-Tin him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> be-Kir, against the wall וְעָצ֥וּר <S%H6113><s%> ve-'a-Tzur and him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <S%H5800><s%> ve-'a-Zuv and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house אַחְאָ֔ב <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av, of Ahab כְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> ke-Veit like the house יָרָבְעָ֣ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נְבָ֑ט <S%H5028><s%> ne-Vat; of Nebat וּכְבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> u-che-Veit and like the house בַּעְשָׁ֥א <S%H1201><s%> ba'-Sha of Baasha בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אֲחִיָּֽה׃ <S%H281><s%> 'a-chi-Yah. of Ahijah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִיזֶ֜בֶל <S%H348><s%> 'i-Ze-vel Jezebel יֹאכְל֧וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu shall eat הַכְּלָבִ֛ים <S%H3611><s%> hak-ke-la-Vim And the dogs בְּחֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> be-Che-lek in the portion יִזְרְעֶ֖אל <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'El of Jezreel וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and none קֹבֵ֑ר <S%H6912><s%> ko-Ver; and [there shall be] none to bury וַיִּפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> vai-yif-Tach [her] And he opened הַדֶּ֖לֶת <S%H1817><s%> had-De-let the door וַיָּנֹֽס׃ <S%H5127><s%> vai-ya-Nos. and fled

וְיֵה֗וּא <S%H3058><s%> ve-ye-Hu, Then Jehu יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza came forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei to the servants אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav, of his lord וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and [one] said לוֹ֙ lo הֲשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ha-sha-Lom, favor מַדּ֛וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' how בָּֽא־ <S%H935><s%> ba- come הַמְשֻׁגָּ֥ע <S%H7696><s%> ham-shug-Ga' this mad הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha; to you וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer [fellow] to thee;And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, about אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem You יְדַעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3045><s%> ye-da'-Tem unto them Ye know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish the man וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שִׂיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H7879><s%> si-Cho. and his communication

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker, [It is] false הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> hag-ged- tell נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na now לָ֑נוּ La-nu; וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, us now And he said כָּזֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> ka-Zot likewise וְכָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> ve-cha-zoT he אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus and thus spake אֵלַי֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai over לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, he to me saying כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD מְשַׁחְתִּ֥יךָֽ <S%H4886><s%> me-shach-Ti-cha I have anointed לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech thee king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. over Israel

וַֽיְמַהֲר֗וּ <S%H4116><s%> vay-ma-ha-Ru, Then they hasted וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu and took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man בִּגְד֔וֹ <S%H899><s%> big-Do, his garment וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu and put תַחְתָּ֖יו <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav under אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on גֶּ֣רֶם <S%H1634><s%> Ge-rem [it] under him on the top הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot; of the stairs וַֽיִּתְקְעוּ֙ <S%H8628><s%> vai-yit-ke-'U and blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> bash-sho-Far, with trumpets וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru saying מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach is king יֵהֽוּא׃ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu. Jehu

וַיִּתְקַשֵּׁ֗ר <S%H7194><s%> vai-yit-kash-Sher, conspired יֵה֛וּא <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu So Jehu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <S%H3092><s%> ye-ho-sha-Fat of Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נִמְשִׁ֖י <S%H5250><s%> nim-Shi of Nimshi אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against יוֹרָ֑ם <S%H3141><s%> yo-Ram; against Joram וְיוֹרָם֩ <S%H3141><s%> ve-yo-Ram (Now Joram הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become שֹׁמֵ֜ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer had kept בְּרָמֹ֣ת <S%H7433><s%> be-ra-Mot Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad, Gilead ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, he and all Israel מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because חֲזָאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> cha-za-'El of Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram. of Syria

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shav was returned יְהוֹרָ֨ם <S%H3088><s%> ye-ho-Ram Joram הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech But king לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <S%H7495><s%> le-hit-rap-Pe to be healed בִיְזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> viy-ze-re-'El, in Jezreel מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַמַּכִּים֙ <S%H4347><s%> ham-mak-Kim of the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַכֻּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> yak-Ku-hu had given אֲרַמִּ֔ים <S%H761><s%> 'a-ram-Mim, which the Syrians בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <S%H3898><s%> be-hil-La-cha-Mo, him when he fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with חֲזָאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> cha-za-'El with Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram; of Aram וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu Jehu אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh If it be נַפְשְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Chem, your minds אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- [then] let none יֵצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze go forth פָלִיט֙ <S%H6412><s%> fa-Lit [nor] escape מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, out of the city לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to go; לְגִּיד le-gid כלְהַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> le-hag-Gid bewray קבְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> be-yiz-re-'El. [it] in Jezreel

וַיִּרְכַּ֤ב <S%H7392><s%> vai-yir-Kav rode in a chariot יֵהוּא֙ <S%H3058><s%> ye-Hu So Jehu וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went יִזְרְעֶ֔אלָה <S%H3157><s%> yiz-re-'E-lah, to Jezreel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for יוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3141><s%> yo-Ram for Joram שֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev lay שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah; there וַֽאֲחַזְיָה֙ <S%H274><s%> va-'a-chaz-Yah there And Ahaziah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah יָרַ֖ד <S%H3381><s%> ya-Rad was come down לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹרָֽם׃ <S%H3141><s%> yo-Ram.
